predicate.note: Frames file for 'become' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: all examples look like this
example.text: Plans that give advertisers discounts for maintaining or increasing ad spending have become permanent fixtures at the news weeklies and underscore the fierce competition between Newsweek, Time Warner Inc.'s Time magazine, and Mortimer B. Zuckerman's U.S. News & World Report.
example.arg: Plans that give advertisers discounts for maintaining or increasing ad spending
permanent fixtures at the news weeklies

example.name: bogus example
example.text: That dress is very becoming on John.
example.note: This is properly not a verb at all, but it will almost certainly by misparsed as one. It has no argument structure.
